ruleEngine.rules.newRules

Class RuleComposite

  • java.lang.Object
    • ruleEngine.rules.newRules.RuleComposite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRule
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RuleCompositeAND, RuleCompositeLazyAND, RuleCompositeLazyOR, RuleCompositeNOT, RuleCompositeOR

    public abstract class RuleComposite
extends java.lang.Object
implements IRule
    Object to be extended by Composite of IRules. Check the validity of all rules added by add(IRule) and allows the use of rule dependencies if those are not respected. It's recommended to use instead of checking atomic rules directly on the RuleChecker.
    See Also:
    IRule, RuleResult, RuleChecker

      • applyResult

        public void applyResult(GameState state,
                        GameAction action,
                        RuleResult result)
        The modification of the game to be applied if all rules are respected.
        Parameters:
        state - The state of the game to be updated.
        action - The allowed action on the game and thus to be performed.
        result - Information to give to the game once the action is performed.

      • getRules

        public java.lang.String getRules()
        Specified by:
        getRules in interface IRule
        Returns:
        a String containing all the class name of each atomic rule in this composite

      • add

        public void add(IRule rule)
        Add a rule to the master rule. It will be checked every time checkAction(GameState, GameAction, RuleResult) is called on the master rule.
        Parameters:
        rule - The atomic to check.
